class.name: OpenTelemetry
class.brief_description: The OpenTelemetry class provides methods for tracing and metrics collection.
class.description: OpenTelemetry is a set of APIs, libraries, agents, and collector services to capture distributed traces and metrics from your application. You can analyze them, and use other observability tools.

method.name: add_event
method.description: Adds an event to the span with the given id.

method.name: end_span
method.description: Ends the span with the given id.

method.name: record_error
method.description: Records an error event in the span with the given id.

method.name: start_span
method.description: Starts a new span with the given name.

method.name: start_span_with_parent
method.description: Starts a new span with the given name and parent id.
